price: E dizem: "Não creremos em ti, até que nos faças emanar, da terra, uma nascente".
arabic: وَقَالُواْ لَن نُّؤۡمِنَ لَكَ حَتَّىٰ تَفۡجُرَ لَنَا مِنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يَنۢبُوعًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waqālū lan nu'mina laka ḥattā tafjura lanā mina al-arḍi yanbūʿan
